attributes.action: provide a scheme to help first-time buyers in Northern Ireland, without the use of Co-ownership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People on benefits and refuse to work are provdided with accomodation. The more we work the less help we get from our government. How can people in Northern Ireland who are on minimum wage try and buy a house when the lowest house price in Belfast is £100,000. Provide us with some form of relief on taxes to allow us to save more money towards a house.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
